sentence.Network_en: Adopt the egalitarian neoliberal model or die?
sentence.Network_cn: 采用平等主义的新自由主义还是灭亡?

sentence.Network_en: The euro was introduced in 1999, the high water mark of neoliberal economics.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧元始于1999年, 它是新自由主义经济学处于高潮的标志.

list.abs: ... Honest Work Ethic ： 诚信工作理念 neoliberal work ethic ： 免费劳动 Demonstrated Strong Work Ethic ： 极强职业道德.
renewal of the workers' movement and resistance to neoliberal policies by ordinary people .工人运动的复兴和普通民众对新自由主义政策的抵制。

since around 1980 , the start of the so-called neoliberal era , the general trend in labor relations in the world has been one of backward movement rather than advance in workers' conditions .自从1980年左右，即所谓的新自由主义时代的开始，世界劳资关系的一般趋势表现为工人状况的倒退而非进步。

in Friedman's sub-Marxian , neoliberal worldview these conflicts are recognized as forms of friction-grit in the workings of an unstoppable machine .从弗里德曼那可以囊括在马克思主义框架下的新自由主义世界观看来，这些冲突都被看成是那部永不停息的全球化机器所产生的磨擦。

means.word_mean: 1. a liberal who subscribes to neoliberalism
1. having or showing belief in the need for economic growth in addition to traditional liberalistic values
